languages.text: {n}Иокаста выхватывает автопистолет и наставляет на сохраняющего невозмутимость Хротко.{/n} "Дам шанс сохранить остатки чести и сознаться. Ты саботировал следствие — зачем?"

{n}Sauerback draws her autopistol and points it at Hrotko, who appears entirely unperturbed.{/n} "I will give you one chance to retain your last shred of honour and confess. You sabotaged the investigation. Why?"
languages.original_text: {n}Иокаста выхватывает автопистолет и наставляет на сохраняющего невозмутимость Хротко.{/n} "Дам шанс сохранить остатки чести и сознаться. Ты саботировал следствие — зачем?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jocasta draws her autopistol and points it at Hrotko, who appears entirely unperturbed.{/n} "I will give you one chance to retain your last shred of honour and confess. You sabotaged the investigation. Why?"

{n}Sauerback draws her autopistol and points it at Hrotko, who had suddenly grown very pale.{/n} "I will give you one chance to confess and retain your last shreds of honour. You sabotaged the investigation. Why?"

{n}Sauerback draws her autopistol and points it at Hrotko, who has suddenly grown very pale.{/n} "I will give you one chance to retain your last shred of honour and confess. You sabotaged the investigation. Why?"

{n}Sauerback draws her autopistol and points it at Hrotko, who appears entirely unperturbed.{/n} "I will give you one chance to retain your last shred of honour and confess. You sabotaged the investigation. Why?"

{n}Sauerback draws her autopistol and points it at Hrotko, who appears entirely unperturbed.{/n} "I will give you one chance to retain your last shred of honour and confess. You sabotaged the investigation. Why?"

{n}Jocasta draws her autopistol and points it at Hrotko, who appears entirely unperturbed.{/n} "I will give you one chance to retain your last shred of honour and confess. You sabotaged the investigation. Why?"

{n}Sauerback draws her autopistol and points it at Hrotko, who appears entirely unperturbed.{/n} "I will give you one chance to retain your last shred of honour and confess. You sabotaged the investigation. Why?"

{n}Sauerback draws her autopistol and points it at Hrotko, who appears entirely unperturbed.{/n} "I will give you one chance to retain your last shred of honour and confess. You sabotaged the investigation. Why?"

languages.text: {n}Sauerback dégaine son pistolet-mitrailleur et le braque sur Hrotko, imperturbable.{/n} « Je vous laisse une dernière chance de sauver le peu d'honneur qu'il vous reste en passant aux aveux. Vous avez saboté l'enquête, et j'exige de savoir pourquoi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback draws her autopistol and points it at Hrotko, who appears entirely unperturbed.{/n} "I will give you one chance to retain your last shred of honour and confess. You sabotaged the investigation. Why?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback dégaine son pistolet-mitrailleur et le braque sur Hrotko, qui affiche subitement une pâleur mortelle.{/n} « Je vous laisse une dernière chance de sauver le peu d'honneur qu'il vous reste en passant aux aveux. Vous avez saboté l'enquête, et j'exige de savoir pourquoi. »

languages.text: {n}Sauerback desenfunda su pistola automática y apunta a Hrotko, que parece totalmente impávido.{/n} «Le daré una sola oportunidad de conservar su último rastro de honor y confesar. Ha saboteado la investigación. ¿Por qué?».
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback draws her autopistol and points it at Hrotko, who appears entirely unperturbed.{/n} "I will give you one chance to retain your last shred of honour and confess. You sabotaged the investigation. Why?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback desenfunda su pistola automática y apunta a Hrotko, que está totalmente pálido.{/n} «Le daré una sola oportunidad de conservar su último rastro de honor y confesar. Ha saboteado la investigación. ¿Por qué?».

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克掏出自动手枪，瞄准了全然不为所动的赫洛卡。{/n}“我给你个机会，让你保留最后一丝荣誉，坦白一切真相。你在破坏这场调查，这是怎么回事？”
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback draws her autopistol and points it at Hrotko, who appears entirely unperturbed.{/n} "I will give you one chance to retain your last shred of honour and confess. You sabotaged the investigation. Why?"

traits.locale_text: {n}苏尔贝克掏出自动手枪，瞄准了赫洛卡，赫洛卡的脸色变得惨白如纸。{/n}“我给你个机会，让你保留最后一丝荣誉，坦白一切真相。你在破坏这场调查，这是怎么回事？”

languages.text: {n}ザウアーバックはオートピストルを引き抜き、フロトコに向けて構えるが、全く動じていないようだ。{/n}「最後の名誉を守り、自白するチャンスを与える。お前は捜査を妨害した。なぜだ？」
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback draws her autopistol and points it at Hrotko, who appears entirely unperturbed.{/n} "I will give you one chance to retain your last shred of honour and confess. You sabotaged the investigation. Why?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ザウアーバックはオートピストルを引き抜き、それを急に青ざめたフロトコに向けた。{/n}「最後の名誉を守り、自白するチャンスを与える。お前は捜査を妨害した。なぜだ？」

languages.text: {n}Sauerback zieht ihre Maschinenpistole und richtet sie auf Hrotko, der völlig gelassen bleibt.{/n} "Ich gebe Euch noch eine letzte Chance, Euren letzten Funken Ehre zu bewahren und zu gestehen. Ihr habt die Ermittlungen sabotiert. Warum?"
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback draws her autopistol and points it at Hrotko, who appears entirely unperturbed.{/n} "I will give you one chance to retain your last shred of honour and confess. You sabotaged the investigation. Why?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback zieht ihre Maschinenpistole und richtet sie auf Hrotko, der plötzlich sehr bleich geworden ist.{/n} "Ich gebe Euch noch eine letzte Chance, Euren letzten Funken Ehre zu bewahren und zu gestehen. Ihr habt die Ermittlungen sabotiert. Warum?"

languages.text: {n}Sauerback, ototabancasını çekerek Hrotko'ya doğrultuyor. Hrotko, hiçbir şekilde istifini bozmuyor.{/n} "Sana zerre kadar kalmış gururunu koruyup itiraf etmen için tek bir şans vereceğim. Soruşturmayı sabote ettin. Neden?"
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback draws her autopistol and points it at Hrotko, who appears entirely unperturbed.{/n} "I will give you one chance to retain your last shred of honour and confess. You sabotaged the investigation. Why?"
